resources.string: Thought journals can help you recognize and change unhelpful thought patterns. The purpose of this exercise is to get you into the habit of paying attention to your thoughts.
Have an idea for an activity you think would be helpful?

The ABC\'s stand for Activating events, Beliefs, and Conequences. The purpose of this worksheet to recognize the link between the things that happen to us, unhelpful beliefs/thoughts, and the consequences of these thoughts and events.
Unhelpful behaviors occur for many reasons. In this activity we will do a chain analysis to help us find these reasons so we can problem solveâ€¦ and try to prevent the behaviors next time!
